title: Project Insights and Lessons Learned (data/insights.json)
description: Compilation of key insights, workflow lessons, epic retrospectives, and model evaluation findings to optimize project development and AI workflow.

docs.title: Comprehensive Project Insights
docs.description: A centralized collection of workflow lessons, AI workflow insights, epic retrospectives, metrics insights, and critical errors, offering valuable lessons learned for project optimization.
docs.summary_ai: This file contains critical workflow lessons (data safety, CLI transparency, JSON file standardization, session control, logging, session start infrastructure, file manifest), AI workflow insights (direct file work, post-merge checks), detailed epic retrospectives, metrics insights (need for evaluation system), model evaluation insights (Cursor model analysis, Gemini/Claude recommendations), and crucial critical errors (omission of llmstruct integration), all contributing to continuous project improvement and AI workflow optimization.
